p: This work was carried out in collaboration between all authors. Author AO designed the study and performed the statistical analysis. He equally wrote the first draft of the manuscript and undertook the final editing of the paper. Author SM wrote the protocol, part of the draft, and embarked in the paper's initial editing. Authors AA and OA carried out most of the literature searches while author BK handled the tissue processing for histology, and author SO performed the histological analysis. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
